titles: Concerning this present Cain in his generation, the unbelieving and wicked heathen, Rom.1 or false Christians, Matt.24. Mark.13. The mightie ones, murtherers and tyrants, Isa.5.29. Ierem.7.19. By whom Satan is turned quite loose now; as who are shedding innocent bloud, Hezek.22, rise or beare up themselves against God in Heaven upon the poor and afflicted, Act.4. and do not spare the very righteous for the maintenance of the hypocrisie and lyes of the disunited, distracted, 2 Tim.3. and divided Rom.16. Sectarian, rayling and disputing of their shepheards, Hezek.13.22.34 The false prophets, cruell ravenous wolves and hirelings, Iam.5.
author: Gifftheil, Ludwig Friedrich, d. 1661.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 7th 1648"; "Written by Henry Guiffthaile ye German profitt. Of the tribe of Juda".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
